page.title: 02PARKESTON QUAY
page.content: There is no doubt that the port at Parkeston is an important part of the {Transport}system of this country.At the moment it is one of the busiest ferry terminals in the country and probably the world.It deals with a huge amount of{tourist}trade, being an important departure point for travel by car, or on foot for Denmark,The Low Countries, and Germany. Even as we are doing our survey plans were being announced to enlarge the port to take even larger ships, and more freight traffic. The main lines which sail are Sealink, D.F.D.S,and Olsen Lines.There is also a large{Railway Station}at the Quay which deals with a wide range of traffic,quite a few passengers, but also a lot of goods in transit to and from the continent. It is the biggest employer in the area.
